snippet: Woody Allen's adopted daughter, Dylan Farrow, on Saturday revisited her sexual abuse claim against the filmmaker in a letter on the website of the New York Times, as she questioned his acclaim in Hollywood....

headline.print_headline: Woody Allen's Adopted Daughter Repeats Sexual Abuse Claim in Letter
headline.main: Woody Allen's Adopted Daughter Repeats Sexual Abuse Claim in Letter

lead_paragraph: Woody Allen's adopted daughter, Dylan Farrow, on Saturday revisited her sexual abuse claim against the filmmaker in a letter on the website of the New York Times, as she questioned his acclaim in Hollywood.
